Class â²

â² represents a timer that sends an event in a specified interval.

Initializers

ğŸ†•

ğŸ”“ ğŸˆ ğŸ†• seconds ğŸš€

Creates a new, stopped timer that ticks every seconds seconds. Seconds must be positive.

Methods

ğŸ

ğŸ”“ ğŸ– ğŸ â¡ï¸ âœ¨

Starts the timer. From then, the timer's counter will increment at a constant rate, and it will begin generating events. Starting a timer that is already started does nothing.

ğŸš¦

ğŸ”“ ğŸ– ğŸš¦ â¡ï¸ âœ¨

Resume the timer specified. From then, the timer's counter will increment at a constant rate, and it will begin generating events. Resuming a timer that is already started does nothing. Resuming a stopped timer will not reset the timer's counter.

â›”

ğŸ”“ ğŸ– â›” â¡ï¸ âœ¨

Stop the timer specified. The timer's counter will stop incrementing and it will stop generating events. Stopping a timer that is already stopped does nothing.
